Name: Total time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that include a major revision cycle
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time for First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to be followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded in variants that eventually lead to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Elapsed time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs earlier in the process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time it takes First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to occur after Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round review variants that later feature SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total resolution time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured until the next occurrence of Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted manuscript variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and First Look-Your updates are overdue in rejected or resubmitted variants that never reach SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to the preceding First Look-Please submit updates in variants involving multiple revision rounds before SW-Reviewer Agreed is recorded
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
